name: Puzzle Hopper
description:
Puzzle Hopper is a game with an innovative mechanics, as it combines puzzles with infinite races.

Place pieces throughout the tour and help your character to get as far as possible.

Each piece is adapted to the terrain. Build mountains of block totally free as the game tetris.

Along the way you will collect apples to give your character. Using an apple, your hopper will be stopped for a while as he eats.
Remember to use the pieces correctly to get as far as possible!

Note that your character can only go up and down from block to block, so you have to be careful and smooth the ground!


Main features:

-Enjoy innovative puzzle game similiar to tetris!
-A Hopper character who advances turning and jumping blocks throught your built path
- Help your hopper to get as far as possible by modifying the terrain
- Give apples to your character, and save time while building a safe path
- Play infinitely and completely free, without intrusive advertising
- Compete against your friends in world rankings
- Skin shop available! Reach the best score and unlock new characters!
- A couple of terrains ! Green Mountains, Inferno and Ice!

Download now this game that blends the best of puzzles and runners, and post your best score!
